items: Eid al-Fitr: the festival prayer held shortly after the month of Ramaḍān.
Eid al-Adha: the festival prayer on the tenth of the Hajj month.

sections.text: It is preferred in an open area outside the city but can also be performed in a masjid.
The prayer consists of two rak‘ahs followed by the imam’s speech (khutbah).
